venue.name: Windham Rail Trail - Windham Depot Entrance

item.description:
Host: Claire P. cell @ 603-247-0897
RAIN SNOW CANCELS THIS EVENT!

Weather permitting, I think it would be fun to go for a bike ride on the Windham Depot Rail Trail. Please know that my intent is to enjoy the view of the area, and to chat along the way.  This event is meant more to have fun than to get a workout.   I thought that we would bike to Salem (3 ½ miles) then head to Derry (6 miles) and have lunch at on East Broadway, then bike back to the  parking lot.  Depending on how fast we can bike the trail and how long we take for lunch, the whole event will take anywhere from 2 ½ hours to 3 ½ hours.

Let’s get back into the shape for biking!  This short trail (total of about 12 miles round trip) has great scenery along the way, and is now paved all the way to Derry!  So, come and join me for a fun time!

 

We will meet at 10:00 am at the Depot Rd parking lot in Windham, NH.  Please follow these directions.  From route 111 take N. Lowell Rd, drive till you see Depot Rd on your right.  Take the right and the parking is on your right about 1000 ft further on the road.

 

Please remember to bring your sunscreen, insect repellent and lots of fluids and dress in layers.

 I hope to see you there!

Please RSVP or call my cell @ 603-247-0897.  There is no need to RSVP no!

 

Liability Release - AS A CONDITION OF ATTENDING THIS MEETUP, YOU AGREE TO hold harmless, and indemnify the organizer and her heirs, and all members and participants of this Meetup group from any and all claims for injury, illness, death, and/or property damage including those caused by negligence, ignorance, inexperience and other reasons. You also agree to assume all mental, physical, financial, and/or other risk associated with this meetup. All  meetup activities pose inherent risks and dangers. Participation in these activities is voluntary and dependent upon your own personal judgment.
item.name: Easy bike ride in Windham NH
